summary: Arcane_Enchanter is custom re-texturing (n not simple recolour) mod which changes how Enchanting Table n Workstation looks.
descriptionHtml:
---README---

for DALLs - Arcane_Enchanter 

v1.0

22/12/2011

Arcane_Enchanter is custom re-texturing (n not simple recolour) mod which changes how Enchanting Table n Workstation looks.*

* Word of warning - my work actually do changes how these items look - rather then \"polishes\" same / boring game \"apple\" a bit further as many other popular mods do - so it might not be fit for casual modders or more-of-same seekers!

Not much to say here as purpose of this mod should be quite obvious. As for reason for making it - I did not care much for Bethesda\'s scruffy one thus this (much) more up-market one. Real must-have - at bargain price ;) - for all serious Home Owners and professional Enchanters. 

To install you need to navigate to your Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim - game folder and paste / drag n drop in it my Data (mod) folder. Allow overwrite!    

If you don\'t like this new look, simply delete / remove my (check for names my mod) texture files from Data/textures/clutter - and original look will be restored to your game.

Bugs/conflicts: none known - but take care not to overwrite them (my textures) by accident!
  
Use:
Free to use but if any files included (therein) are to be used for modding ask me for permission!

Enjoy and try to remember - if you like it even in a part - to give endorsement! 

Thanks to Bethesda for really great game.
author: Dall
